description: Demolition of an existing side conservatory, erection of part two storey/part single storey rear and side, single storey front porch extension. Roof alteration with first floor front extension, 1no front dormer and increase in roof height. Installation of 3nos side rooflights.
decision_conditions: The proposed development would be incongruous and would not respect the character or appearance of the existing dwelling or the wider area. In this regard, the proposal is not in keeping with the character and appearance of the area and is contrary to Policies D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's Core Strategy 2012 and the Council's Residential Design Guidance 2012.

It has not been demonstrated that the proposal would not harm trees of amenity value. Were any harm to, or loss of, retained trees to occur this would harm the character and appearance of the host dwelling and the wider area. Therefore, Policies D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's Core Strategy 2012 and the Council's Residential Design Guidance 2012.
